reviewText: Love the old Perry Mason TV movies
Keeps you guessing al the way to the end.  Very enjoyable
Great movie I feel like I am  in the  movie  with them perry  mason was the  best lawyer tv show and movies thank you for  them
The continuation of the Perry Mason movie series---and like the others, excellent and engrossing. Highly recommended.
Always happy with Perry Mason DVD's.
Here you get two top-notch Mason episodes.  I find Burr's series closer to E. S. Gardner's original than those movies made in the 1940's, where Mason is often reduced to a  comic role.
We enjoy the Perry Mason made-for-TV movies.
I love Perry Mason movies.  I will watch these over and over again.
Good plot, good price, good quality
another good series of the Perry Mason movie collection as always it's very entertaining

How can you go wrong with Perry Mason? While the movies are definitely not the series they do bring Raymond Burr back in his famous role.  Add Barbara Hale and you  got  a great reunion.  Since I purchased this video- the entire movie collection was released a much better deal  for us PM fans that want it all!
I enjoyed both of the cases, but have to admit that they were not among my favorites.
